rmi
Class Network

java.lang.Object
  rmi.Network

public class Network
extends java.lang.Object

Class that resembles the network that the client and server are associated with. The port can be interchangeable and by using the kryo library this project can actual connect on multiple computers on a local network such as 192.168.0.2 or etc...

Nested Class Summary
static class Network.ChatMessage
          The class tha manages chat messages being sent across from client to server to other clients.
static class Network.RegisterName
          The class manages when clients are just signing onto the server.
static class Network.RosterUpdate
          The class tha manages when a user signs in to update the roster.
static class Network.UpdateNames
          The class that manages when clients are sign off and must update the name list column.

Method Detail

register

public static void register(com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.EndPoint endPoint)
This registers objects that are going to be sent over the network. This needs to be set up so that kryo serializes these classes in order for anything to be sent over from server to client and vice versa.
